Title: Plaque Attack
RichPresencePatch:
Format:Digit
FormatType=Value

Lookup:Food
0x00=🍔
0x19=🌭
0x30=🍟
0x0b=🍓
0x22=🍒
0x3d=🍩
0x46=🍭
0x54=🍦

Lookup:Tube
0xe5=Full
0xce=Full
0xb7=Almost Full
0xa3=Almost Full
0x39=Over Half
0x27=Over Half
0x10=Half
0x00=Half
0x5e=Less Than Half
0x50=Less Than Half
0x8c=Almost Empty
0x75=Almost Empty
0x81=Empty

Lookup:Tooth
1=🦷 
0=_ 

Lookup:Game
0x00=One Player - Advanced 
0x01=Two Players - Advanced
0x02=One Player - Beginner
0x03=Two Players - Beginner

Display:
?0xh19!=0_0xh6f!=0?In Game Select Screen
?0xh19!=0_0xh6f=0?Wachting Demo Screen
Game: @Digit(0xh00_v1) - @Game(0xh00) | 💯: @Digit(b0xh38*10000_b0xh39*100_b0xh003a) | Bonus 🦷: @Digit(0xh37) | Food: @Food(0xh07) | Upper Gum: @Tooth(0xt24) @Tooth(0xs24) @Tooth(0xr24) @Tooth(0xq24) @Tooth(0xp24) @Tooth(0xo24) @Tooth(0xn24) @Tooth(0xm24) | Bottom Gum: @Tooth(0xt23) @Tooth(0xs23) @Tooth(0xr23) @Tooth(0xq23) @Tooth(0xp23) @Tooth(0xo23) @Tooth(0xn23) @Tooth(0xm23) | Toothpaste Tube: @Tube(0xh09)

Achievements.Description: Lose all the teeth in the mouth
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Learning How to Clean Your Teeth
Achievements.Description: Watch the demonstration of the game for 2 minutes
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Hamburgers Cause Tartar Tooth
Achievements.Description: Blast all hamburgers in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Hot Dogs Cause Mouth Sores
Achievements.Description: Blast all hot dogs in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Fries Cause Gum Disease
Achievements.Description: Blast all fries in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Strawberries Are Ok, but Brush Your Teeth After Eating Them
Achievements.Description: Blast all strawberries in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Gum Drops (Cherries?) Cause Tooth Decay
Achievements.Description: Blast all gum drops in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Donuts Cause Stained Teeth
Achievements.Description: Blast all donuts in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Candy Canes Cause Dental Plaque
Achievements.Description: Blast all candy canes in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Ice Cream Cones Cause Sensitive to Cold
Achievements.Description: Blast all ice cream cones in a wave before the toothpaste tube starts shrink (Game 1 or 2)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Baby Tooth
Achievements.Description: Reach a score of 2,000 or more to earn your first bonus tooth
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: A Beautiful Smile
Achievements.Description: Complete the mouth with all teeth
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Gap-Toothed
Achievements.Description: Have all teeth in the mouth except the upper central incisors
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Toothpaste Super Protection
Achievements.Description: With all teeth in the mouth don't lose any teeth in a wave
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: Super Plaque Attack! Blasted
Achievements.Description: Blast all foods of the second cycle or higher (Game 1)
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild

Achievements.Title: You're an Official No Plaque Packer!
Achievements.Description: Reach a score of 35,000 points or more
Achievements.Author: Szhymphild
